Uses of Class
games.saloon.Tile

  • Packages that use Tile 
    Package Description
    games.saloon
    Use cowboys to have a good time and play some music on a Piano, while brawling with enemy Cowboys.

    • Uses of Tile in games.saloon

      Fields in games.saloon declared as Tile 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Tile YoungGun.callInTile
      The Tile that a Cowboy will be called in on if this YoungGun calls in a Cowboy.
      Tile Cowboy.tile
      The Tile that this Cowboy is located on.
      Tile Bottle.tile
      The Tile this bottle is currently flying over.
      Tile YoungGun.tile
      The Tile this YoungGun is currently on.
      Tile Furnishing.tile
      The Tile that this Furnishing is located on.
      Tile Tile.tileEast
      The Tile to the 'East' of this one (x+1, y).
      Tile Tile.tileNorth
      The Tile to the 'North' of this one (x, y-1).
      Tile Tile.tileSouth
      The Tile to the 'South' of this one (x, y+1).
      Tile Tile.tileWest
      The Tile to the 'West' of this one (x-1, y).
      Fields in games.saloon with type parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Tile> Game.tiles
      All the tiles in the map, stored in Row-major order.
      Methods in games.saloon that return Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile Game.getTileAt(int x, int y)
      Gets the Tile at a specified (x, y) position
      Methods in games.saloon that return types with arguments of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Tile> Tile.getNeighbors()
      Gets the neighbors of this Tile
      Methods in games.saloon with parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Cowboy.act(Tile tile)
      Defaults the value for the optional arg 'drunkDirection' to '""'
      boolean Cowboy.act(Tile tile, java.lang.String drunkDirection)
      Does their job's action on a Tile.
      boolean Tile.hasNeighbor(Tile tile)
      Checks if this Tile has a specific neighboring Tile
      boolean Cowboy.move(Tile tile)
      Moves this Cowboy from its current Tile to an adjacent Tile.
